mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl (mem_id, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_email, ord_price) values (#{mem_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_zipcode}, #{ord_addr}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_email}, #{ord_price})
insert into ordetail_tbl select #{ord_code}, c.pro_code, c.cart_amount, p.pro_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_code = p.pro_code where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select ot.ord_code, pt.pro_name, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, ot.dt_price, ot.dt_amount, pt2.payment_status from ordetail_tbl ot inner join product_tbl pt on ot.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join payment_tbl pt2 on pt2.ord_code = ot.ord_code where ot.ord_code = #{ord_code}
